entry.content:
I should have written the review on the day I have completed the book itself. But I procrastinated and so might miss some points(my thoughts) that I felt about making notes of....

My Review:¬†A good motivating book. The book introduces the success formula using a story format. The main concept is only at the end. You will have to read the given chapter for 100 days without break and with full heart. I am still on third day and will write an update here, once I complete 100 days. It is expected that there will be a change in the behavior and your attitude.

My Rating: ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê (4/5)

The following are my notes/quotation which I really liked:

"The beginning of pride is in heaven. The continuance of pride is on earth. The end of pride is in hell."

Definition of pride: a feeling or satisfaction derived from one's own achievements, the achievements of those with whom one is closely associated, or from qualities or possessions that are widely admired.

Definition itself says everything. I don't have many words to add.

Most humans, in varying degrees, are already dead. In one way or another they have lost their dreams, their ambitions, their desire for a better life. They have surrendered their fight for self-esteem and they have compromised their great potential. They have settled for a life of mediocrity, days of despair and nights of tears. They are no more than living deaths confined to cemeteries of their choice. Yet they need not remain in that state. They can be resurrected from their sorry condition. They can each perform the greatest miracle in the world. They can each come back from the dead... and in those books are the simple secrets, techniques, and methods which they can still apply to their own lives to become anything they wish to be and to attain all the true riches of life."

The author emphasizes book reading as a habit to reach success. In some sense, he is talking about books like Elliot's five foot collection. He encourages us to read books that will make you think, inculcate values. But he also says that he has already read most of the great books and found that they all teach the same thing albeit in different ways.¬†

He says that today people are forgetting their dreams ambitions etc. which have driven our life during our childhood. Instead we are living in a safe zone and have given up our ambitions. This is creating the whole problems. We are living like dead without any new hope etc.

most of us build prisons for ourselves and after we occupy them for a period of time we become accustomed to their walls and accept the false premise that we are incarcerated for life. As soon as that belief takes hold of us we abandon hope of ever doing more with our lives and of ever giving our dreams a chance to be fulfilled. We become puppets and begin to suffer living deaths. It may be praiseworthy and noble to sacrifice your life to a cause or a business or the happiness of others, but if you are miserable and unfulfilled in that lifestyle, and know it, then to remain in it is a hypocrisy, a lie, and a rejection of the faith placed in you by your creator.

He says, that we are blaming our situation/series of events/god for our bad luck. We donot understand that this was our fault. We forget that it was we whole have tried to create this wall in the name of future security. As time passes we get accustomed to the fate we have created and live like dead.

He says that instead of living a miserable life(even if you are financially successful), live a life which keeps us happy. We should live for a cause which will make our life a mark in history. Live for your ambition, childhood dream etc. We should start living for the purpose for which the creator has created us. Don't live in a lie, comparing your riches with a poor(may be he is more happy!), or comparing your literacy with an illiterate(may be he has more good moral values than yours.). It is better to live a life which will help uplift somebody's life for that can give you immense happiness which not even earning millions of dollars. Because we are humans and have evolved by living in a society. A smile in other person's face will make you more happy than million dollars in your bank account.

'The mind is its own place, and in itself can make a heaven of hell, and a hell of heaven.'

our mind is the greatest creation on earth and it can generate the most sublime happiness for its owner‚Äîor it can destroy him. Yet, although we have been given the secret of how to control it, for our happiness and benefit, we still function completely ignorant of its potential, like the most stupid of animals.

The way we perceive this world depends on how we see it. if you see yourself in a hell, then even heaven will look like hellüòÇ. We should be open and broad minded. We should avoid prejudice on every topic. Stop complaining.¬†

The best way to keep make yourself in heaven is to first de-clutter yourself. Do one thing at a time. This is my personal experience. For example, while reading a wikipedia article if I start opening all the hyperlinks, then at the end the overwhelming information makes me feel exhausted and at the end I will only have superficial knowledge about the main topic I wanted to read. Because our cognitive capacity is limited. Use it wisely.

Start to forgive
Start to believe god is with you
Start to beieve what ever is happening is for your good
Don't forget to take calculated risks......

Every person has his time. You should be patient. When time is ripe, when you are ready to serve your purpose, sometimes unknowingly you will be pushed by god to serve your purpose and make this world a beautiful place.

The way think, the way it will happen. So start being optimistic.

while we are all different, each unique in his or her own way, our lack of self-esteem which produced our failure is a universal sickness always originating from the complex of either anxiety, guilt, or inferiority... the three standard emotional problems recognized by most students of psychiatry.

Everybody has a unique purpose in this world. But we don't believe in that. We can do what ever can be done by any person on this planet. We can do what Jeff Bezos can do, we can do what Bill Gates can do.... We don't believe it because we are anxious(because of negative thoughts, fear of any harm, safety offered by safe zone. In sum, we are first of all feared of any new thing happening in our life.), guilt(because we continue to live in our past. We are not able to forgive ourselves. Of course regretting the past is good. But we should understand that once we have learnt the lesson, we should be steadfast not to repeat it. Everybody in life makes a mistake. There is no need to continue to live in past just because you have done/experienced something wrong. First thing you have to understand is to forgive others, forgive yourself. For this start with an apology keeping aside your pride!), inferiority(because you have failed in the past doesn't mean you shouldn't try again. First check the cause for your failure. Mostly the failure is because you have not believed yourself "completely" that you can do the task. This led to you only applying partial of yourself. The other reason is surrounding yourself with foolish and pessimistic people who don't believe in you or your ideology. Don't worry start afresh, believing completely yourself, surrounding yourself with "only few" optimistic people who believe in you and your ideology, have patience, perseverance. Dedicate yourself completely.)

And don't copy or imitate anyone. Do it your own way. If you solve your problem with some other's strategy it will not work and you will fail. You will be writing a different(difficult) answer for a easy question.

"One of the saddest things in life is that the only thing we can do for eight hours a day, day after day, is work. We can't eat for eight hours a day, nor drink for eight hours a day, nor make love for eight hours a day-all we can do for eight hours is work. Which is the reason why man makes himself and everybody else so miserable and unhappy."

This quote applies to a person who has committed himself/herself to a work s/he dislikes.¬† If you are not happy with your work, just leave it. Do something that you like. Become a great person in it. There is no work in this world like it is unworthy of doing. In every sphere we will always see a legend.

experience was usually an overrated quality.

"We should be careful to get out of an experience all the wisdom that is in it... not like the cat that sits down on a hot stove lid. She will never sit down on a hot stove lid again... and that is well... but also, she will never sit down on a cold one, anymore."

In my opinion, the above quote says: experience is something which we can gain in many ways. There is no need to do a job just because you will gain experience. Instead strive for wisdom. If you want to gain experience(in the job that you love to do) for example on how to serve people, you can do it in many ways: start an NGO, become IAS, become Chief Minister, become Prime Minister.... Every path is different but you will learn a lot. Choose the path that you are comfortable with. And remember all the paths converge at the end depending upon your effort.

no person ever had a defect that was not really a potential benefit rather than an adversity...

a handsome stag admired his horns and hated his ugly feet. But one day, a hunter came and the stag's ugly feet enabled him to flee to safety. Later, his beautiful horns became caught in the thicket and before he could escape he was shot.

We have already discussed this in the review of book: Return to me: "Every one of us has things about us that aren‚Äôt perfect‚Äîit‚Äôs just that yours is a little more noticeable than ours."

"I was taught that everything is attainable if you're prepared to give up, to sacrifice, to get it. Whatever you want to do, you can do it, if you want to do it badly enough... and I do believe that. I believe that if I wanted to run a mile in four minutes I could do it. I would have to give up everything else in life, but I could run a mile in four minutes. I believe that if a man wanted to walk on water and was prepared to give up everything else in life, he could do that."

Work with passion. Give your 100%. There is nothing in this world that you cannot achieve(at least you can achieve everthing which someone has already achieved). For example: Benjamin Franklin in his autobiography says that he used to open his printing press early even before most people in the city woke up, and closed after many were asleep. This is called as dedication. Work hard and dedicate yourself. You will get everything in your life. Just time matters.

Norman Vincent Peale once said that the only time he found people with no problems was when he walked through a cemetery.

Understand that you are not the only person with problems. Everybody has his/her own set of problems. Only a person who fails complain about their problems. A successful person never even thinks about his problem as a problem itself. S/he sees it as an opportunity. For example, if you are building house and some one who is jealous of you tries to vandalize your house by hurling stones. A successful person takes those stones and uses it in construction. The person who is throwing the stone at the end should have financed the construction of your house.

there is a strong possibility that several planetary positions, when they occur, may exert some sort of immeasurable force that effects our actions in groups, so that sometime they make us fight, sometime they make us love, sometime they make us write and paint and compose... and all the while we think we are doing these and other things solely for rational reasons. We may all be puppets on a string but we must learn what controls that string, out there, and then cut it, otherwise we will never reach our full potential nor will we ever regain our self-esteem.

In essence, don't believe in astrology or other devil stuff. Because it is a double edged sword. Instead believe in yourself. Find the cause for your failure, not a scrape goat for your failure.¬†There is something that is stopping you from success:¬†Guilt? Inferiority? Anxiety?.... Just find out, stop it from influencing you. Success will be yours.

Just believe: "god is with you."

"Nothing is more disgraceful than that an old man should have nothing to show to prove that he has lived long, except his years."

Live your life such that people are ready to write books about you, make movies about you, follow you.... Make history. Live like you have lived your life not your days.

"While you die, you should feel satisfied that you have given 100% of what you are capable of. Leave rest to history, it will record your name"

'The God Memorandum' is only your ticket to a new life. It will do nothing for you unless you open your mind and your heart to receive it. By itself it will move you not one inch in any direction. The means of transportation, and the power to break your inertia, must be generated by forces long dormant but still alive within you.

Now at the end, author gives tells us the synopsis of most of the great books. He presents it in the form of God's memorandum. He tells us:

  1. First, mark this day upon your calendar. Then, count forward one hundred days and mark that day.
    • My 100th day falls on October 25 2020.
  2. Create some amulet and wear it such that it is visible. It should continuously remind you about the God's memorandum and its values for next 100 days. it should remind you that you are progressing in your life. You are going to become a different and great person by the end of 100 days.
    • As of writing I haven't created anything of that sorts. May be I should think of something of that sorts. I will update as soon as I do so.
    • Suggestion of author is to use a paper pin and a waste cloth(possessions of a rag picker) as your amulet.
  3. Do not, under any conditions, divulge the meaning of your amulet to those who may inquire during your hundred-day mission.
    • I think this will help you not get discouraged by fools and their propaganda.¬†
    • It can also be like: some curious people will ask about this everyday until they get the answer. May be this kind of questioning will be a constant reminder for you.
  4. Read 'The God Memorandum' before you retire, each night, for one hundred nights... and then sleep in peace, Let no reason or excuse force you to forego the reading for even one night.¬†

By the hundredth day... you will be a living miracle... a new person...

After you experience change in you, only after[100 days] you experience change you can become another rag picker(A person who finds scrap, here scrap refers to people who are living dead) and share this philosophy. But be careful to share this philosophy to only a person who will for sure listen to you. Otherwise they might simply make fun of you and discourage you.

And do it only with love and compassion.

¬†

entry.summary: Source: https://www.goodreads.com/book/show/17384512-return-to-meAuthor: Lynn Austin Reading Time: Around 2.5 days Some lines which I felt interesting from the book: This is about astrology, idolatry etc..... ‚ÄúThis is how idolatry begins,‚Äù Iddo said. ‚ÄúWith simple curiosity. Before long, we grow accustomed to seeking signs and omens, and…
entry.content:
Author: Lynn Austin

Reading Time: Around 2.5 days

First: My thoughts:

  • Women:
    • A person who prays to real god will respect women.
    • He will treat all the women in life with dignity.
    • He will respect their thoughts, opinions etc.
  • Every life is important.
  • Believe in one god, don't simply pray to all the god you will encounter because every religion preaches same thing. But in different ways. If you keep on switching the religions(or all more gods to your religion), then you might interpret the preaching in wrong way(because each religion has its own custom) and do wrong to this world.
  • Stay away from all the new Babas flooding the market. They are all pagans.
    • In my opinion(Only my opinion and you may disagree. I will respect your opinion also) Sai Baba is very new. So my belief of not praying to him is also okay!ü§î
  • ¬†God will answer your questions but not in a way you see in movies. Just keep complete faith in him. But at some point based on your faith, you will certainly feel his presence.
  • Every person has a purpose to do in his life(Zechariah's purpose in life was to build the holy temple). You should take that one step in your life to fulfill that purpose. Otherwise somebody else born with the same purpose will do it. Ex: Berekiah and his brother were reluctant to take the chance, they couldn't make it into history.
  • Forgive people because they are doing things because of ignorance. They will regret doing such things later in their life.
    • Ex: Yael wanted to elope with Rafi. If she had did that even after warning from elders(of course if Rafi would have accepted that proposal), then she would have regretted taking that decision. As god was very kind, he:
      • Didn't allow Rafi to accept the proposal for being eloping.
      • Sent Zachariah to save her.
    • Another example is Iddo saw her wife Dinah committing adultery. He forgave her.¬†
  • You can only win people's heart by love and not by forcing them. Of course god will create an opportunity to express your love. Wait Patiently.¬†
  • Patience is always needed. Because you will see so many hurdles in your life before you accomplish your task. Even if you doing something related to god. He will test your patience.
  • Never pray to god because you fear him, pray to with love.¬†
    • Example: I'm preparing for IAS exam. I can crack the exam and become IAS officer without praying to god also. There are two problems: First, it will take long time. Second, I will achieve success in wrong way because without god's help I will(may) not be able to get rid of masturbation.¬†
    • But with god's help I will be able to delegate the task of getting rid of my bad habits(Masturbation + Excess sleep). With this I only have to concentrate on my studies. So I will do it the right way + withing short span of time
  • If you are confused, or for that matter if you want to start anything pray god for his guidance.
  • God might have created stars to foresee, but it is very difficult to predict something just by astrology. You need expertise to predict completely. In my opinion having seen my mother(she is still a beginner) & her gurus, you will always miss a star/something and will get a wrong answer. Also I think, if a person has gained so much expertise to foresee 100% accurately, s/he should also have seen god.
    • Example: Recently, these seers were not able to predict the upcoming danger - Corona. They failed completely. They extended the last date for Corona virus as many times as Modi government extended lockdown!!üòï
  • Be brave if you are doing right thing even if it hard and has some dilemmas.
    • Example: King Zerubbabel, took a brave decision not to halt the construction of the temple for good of the society even he was asked to stop it.

Some lines which I felt interesting from the book:

This is about astrology, idolatry etc.....

‚ÄúThis is how idolatry begins,‚Äù Iddo said. ‚ÄúWith simple curiosity. Before long, we grow accustomed to seeking signs and omens, and they no longer seem like abominations. The idols seem worthy of our worship. The pagans believe they can manipulate their false gods and bribe them to do their bidding. But the Holy One cannot be bribed. Instead we bend our wills to match His. The Torah instructs us to remain separate, to be holy.‚Äù

This is about the need for law, restriction on us in the form of religious texts, constitution etc.:

Because we‚Äôre not free when there are no boundaries‚Äîwe‚Äôre in great danger.

This is about disability in every person(Conversation between Yael and Hodaya(who is differently abled)):

Every one of us has things about us that aren‚Äôt perfect‚Äîit‚Äôs just that yours is a little more noticeable than ours.

Finally this is about how problem givers behave:

As the proverb says of evildoers, ‚Äòtheir feet rush into sin.‚Äô

Review:

Babylonian king sees a hand in air(only hand without any person) writing something on a wall when they are partying. Now king gets worried and calls Rebbe Daniel to read the script for king. Daniel reads the script and tells that it is a warning from god for all the mistakes they have committed by taking Jews into captivity and making them slaves. He says that Babylonian king will be killed and conquered by Persians.

As written by the hand, Persians will conquer the land and kill Babylonian king. Now the talk of whether Jews will be freed from captivity or not starts. But for few months the routine in the kingdoms continues as usual.

Meanwhile, Zachariah(grandson of Iddo) continues his studies with Torah. Iddo and his family continue their worship etc. as usual. Yael is Zachariah's neighbor and also his friend. Her mother is ill, and Yael's family consult astrologers, pagan gods etc. for her cure. At last her mother dies. But, Yael is lured by a sorceress about the astrology(which according to Jewish tradition is wrong).

After few months the new king Cyrus accepts that the Jewish people should be left free and should also be allowed to build their temple. Iddo decides to leave but his sons and daughters are not ready to leave because they are satisfied with Babylonian life. Mattaniah(Yael's father) also decides to leave. Zachariah who is close to his grandfather falls in dilemma whether to leave with his grandfather or stay with his parents. At last Zachariah feels the presence of god's message: that he should go to Jerusalem leaving his parents behind.

Yael dosn't want to leave Babylon because here mother's mortal remains are there and also she likes to learn more about sorcery. So she runs away on the day of journey. But Mattaniah finally finds her and brings her back. They start their journey and reach Jerusalem.

After their arrival, they are asked to leave by the local people. But Jews continue to stay in Jerusalem. They start building their temple, but will have to face so many hurdles.¬†

  • First hurdle comes from local people who like to participate in construction of the temple. But Jews don't like that offer because, if local Samaritans are allowed to participate they will have as much right to offer prayer to god in sanctum, which their god forbids. So they bring political pressure and make sure that the construction activity stops.

Locals also start terrorist attacks on Jews. In the process Iddo's wife Dinah losses her cousin and best friend ~Soshanna.

Meanwhile Iddo's decision to convince elders in the Jewish community leads to attack on Soshanna and Dinah. In the process Dinah looses Soshanna. Now Dinah starts blaming Iddo for his decision to both leave her family(sons and daughters) at Babylon and also the decision to convince elders to turn down the offer from locals for building the temple.

Dinah sees that Joel(Soshanna's husband) feel desolate and tries to comfort him. She suddenly feels happy with Joel. One day when both of them are hugging each other Iddo arrives and feels the agony. At last he forgives her and this causes her so much guilt. Also she tells the truth that Dinah has not committed any physical adultery and only mentally. Of Joel only lures Dinah because he wants to take revenge on Iddo's convincing. Joel's feeling is: "Iddo and other priests who supported the idea of turning down the offer should have lost their wives."

Matannaiah after reaching Jerusalem itself buys a patch of land from local people and starts farming. In the process Yael makes friend of Land lord and local village leader Zabad's(He is also a Jew) daughter Leyla. Leyla is a weak person and Yael uses her astrology to predict her future and also cheers her up so that usually Leyla's illness reduces. Because of Sorcery she makes new friends(Leyla's grandmother who also has some knowledge and believes sorcery) and also gains so much reputation among locals.¬†

Now one day Zabad's wife gives birth to a baby with the help of midwife Dinah. But that baby is discarded because of her Disability. Dinah hates that idea and brings that baby to home. She names her Hodaya and is adopted by Iddo and Hodaya.¬†

Yael's friend Leyla is married to a business person. After few days she dies while giving birth to a baby. Yael along with Leyla's brother Rafi mourn the loss and in the process fall in love with each other. Mattaniah hates that love(Because of their customs and ill respect towards women) and gets Yael married to Zachariah(who from childhood loved her and tried many times to keep her away from Leyla and Sorcery).

Meanwhile many of Yael's predictions go wrong(even her prediction of getting married with Rafi). After Yael's marriage with Zachariah, Rafi shows his true colour by trying to kill both Yael and Zachariah. Rafi didn't want something which he could get. While Rafi tries to kill both of them, Iddo gets and bad dream and wakes up to see that their grandchildren are under threat and saves them. In the process, Iddo takes a stab in his stomach from Rafi. Rafi is killed in the process. Iddo lives on surviving the attack.

After few years, drought creates shortage of food and water in Jerusalem. Now they realize that the wrath of god has created this and at the end they start building the temple again.

This time they are again stopped by local government but they continue the work in spite of threats because of their belief of god. At the end the kingdom archives are searched and they find that the perished king Cyrus's(persian king who conquered the Babylon) proclamation for letting Jews go home and build their temple. New king orders the local government not to cause any trouble for Jews.¬†

Meanwhile Zachariah feels gods' presence again.¬†

At the end temple is finished and god starts his journey to stay with the people of Jerusalem.¬†

Review:¬†A good book, which is not at all boring except for a very few places. If you are not a christian or jew then reading this book will improve your knowledge about their religion. The book also encourages many ethical values that a person should possess.¬†

My Rating: ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê

¬†

entry.content:
Certainly, it was the series of events which led to the petty fight.

I should have also mentioned about the pre lunch mood. So I read the book on pent house terrace and was already feeling exhausted by ~12:30. But I waited till 1:00 and as soon as I went down, things were ready on the table but none of the family members were ready to eat. I waited for arond 5 minutes then I started complaining father "initially it was 12:30, then 12:45, now 1:00. I think till will only go beyond 1:00." I was expressing my need for missing discipline. This, kind of created a bad mood in all the faces. Now father, "If you want you start eating, why are you waiting for us....". All this kind of arguments went on.

And Amma was not happy with the argument and she with her usual sad face came inside and said, "I was ready, I only wanted 5 minutes to hang the wet clothes........". I was fed up and went to table took my plate and started serving myself(Of course with a bad mood face). Then may be because of Amma, everybody came to the table for lunch.

Anyways I have recorded things in the audio about these events for 17 July 2020 recoding.

As I generally, apologize even for the smallest of the events, I was expecting an apology from my sister. But as soon as my knuckle got hurt, for one time she asked me "if anything happened", then after that, she started only to get away from the blame of hurting me. This is what I remember.

Now, I was furious about the way she was trying to evade blame on her. Because of this only I replied in mocking words.

But in the evening discussion, Amma told me that she asked if anything happened only. Amma didn't acknowledge about the way she was trying to evade the guilt on her.

But anyways, Sister was already with her unhappy face and after my night walk, I went to her and apologized with a feeling that I might be wrong.

Anyways as I said yesterday, let's forget about this stupid petty fight.

Om Namah Shivayaüïâüôè.

entry.title: Can I expect an apology?
entry.summary: Okay listen what happened: I think this is the first test for lord Ganesha to stop me from masturbation because of this anxiety. The ghee in the vessel was not melted. My sister her highness you know is lazy, but for all the praises that…
entry.content:
Okay listen what happened:

I think this is the first test for lord Ganesha to stop me from masturbation because of this anxiety.

The ghee in the vessel was not melted. My sister her highness you know is lazy, but for all the praises that she has been receiving(may be I'm not sure), took the ghee vessel and got ghee in it melted. Now you know a lazy person feels even a very small work a very great one. So as soon as she came back to the table asked me to take hold of the ghee vessel. I thought of taking it, but as it was hot I took the plate on which she can keep the vessel.

But the plate was smaller one, so there are chances that that ghee vessel once place will touch my grip of the plate. She instead of taking the plate for herself and placing on that now started lowering my hand which was catching the plate and in the air. In the process one of my knuckles hit the rice vessel which was already hot.

Reflex in me pulled back my hand. On whole she didn't want a blame on her which I was able to sense through her words and face. And also she only likes praises, no scolding and other things. Also as this was a small thing I also wanted to leave it. But you know only from few days I am writing these posts and will take time before I will become very cool person. Now for the question : "Did anything happen?", I replied: "nothing happened, nothing..." - but what happened was the tone was mocking. Because I was not speaking from my heart.

Soon a fight erupted. But my tone was mocking because she didn't want to hear wrongdoing. She is always like that. Lunch went on silently, she ate very fast or may be very less I don't know. After she completed her lunch, I asked Amma if I was wrong? Now she said that I didn't know how to talk and that is the reason why I'm facing all the problems. To which I replied: "I always want to tell the truth, want transparency. But as soon as I speak truth(what my heart says), everybody is crying and don't even want to listen to me! Now I want to speak something, but I'm speaking of something else because of which I'm unable to convey my words correctly." Tears rolled down her eyes. Amma's reply: "Very good, very good, you are feared of sister, I'm feared of you, etc." But you know she didn't say that everybody in the house are feared of her also. Then father replied to Amma: "I'm feared of you"...........

Now my question to you is:

My knuckles got hurt(of course it was very small one). It was because of her laziness this happened. Generally I apologize for even the smallest of the harm(both mentally and physically), sometimes even there is no fault of mine. Should I expect an apology?

My heart says it is a very simple thing, if physically harm was not that much and you wanted to neglect it then the way you spoke should have hurt her and you should apologize her.

But my heart says this should be left.......There is some nullity in my mind as I write this post. Is it just because of burning my hand should I expect a sorry?

NO.........

I'm not expecting any sorry and also I will not apologize because it was a series of things that happened. May I should change my attitude. Try not to say anything mockingly if you can't say it in correct way. I now feel my attitude is only wrong.¬†

Fine I will change it.

Thank you lord Shiva now I don't have any anxiety and anger. I'm cool. But it took me around 1:30 hrs to cool down. With god's blessings this time will only reduce and I will be cool not anger, no anxiety....only love......only happiness.......only cheerfulness..............

This is very silly thing to take into my mind. AP leave it.

entry.content:
Actually I don't watch porn for hours and hours because it only became a "habit" from end of last december. Also I don't have that much sperm count as apparent from the falling of my dick after first ejaculation. Okay, coming back I regret having this bad habit, but you know it had its own advantages during my GATE exam last month preparation. It will give you some dose of adrenaline which you can help overcome anxiety. But now I'm fighting very hard to get rid of this bloody thing. First thing I did was start cycling back again(of course for fitness also) so that most of my energy is spent in cycling and less amount of energy is left for masturbation.¬†

Now this stupid corona, I am taking many many breaks and with so much of energy your body will only remind you of Julia Anna. Isn't it? What a sexy porn star she is! Her boobs make my dick rise, her seduction and her laugh make my dick rise. Of course these are all manly things which I should experience in my life, but now too far.

Now of course I feel like squeezing the sperms out of my dick watching the MadamILF!!

And by the way I don't want to blame corona for my porn watching, I should atleast find some other way to use my energy. Maybe as many say, watching porn by me is something of an excuse for some other inner insecurity feeling in me? Or am I one of those scoundrels who don't have control on their senses? I can't answer that for sure, because I wanted to go a trip for so long after my GATE results(which of course was great).

I can say one thing, I respect women to their fullest. But my gut feeling says I will leave this bad habit once Corona is gone. But I'm not sure because I don't know when I will get a chance to travel so that my inner one will forget all the stupid things.

Neurons that fire together, wire together

So what is happening is, during my GATE and other exams preparation(mostly during the end) when ever I used to feel anxiety after mock test score, to continue with the preparation and to feel cheerful I thought of masturbation. Now inner me knows it is a very bad idea so it used to feel more anxiety. So in total:

Exam anxiety + Porn anxiety = more anxiety.

But you know after masturbation, your anxiety levels are very low. Now what happened was, the neurons wired together that whenever I will feel anxiety even if it very small thing I feel like masturbating and vice versa.

You know? I don't feel like masturbating whenever I don't feel anxious, but you know life is after all filled with complete anxieties.

Now as I write, I feel like:

To get rid of this bad habit, don't go the straight way. Take another route!

I thought of masturbating only when I'm not anxious, but what if this will misfire in another way? i.e. may be in future I will feel like masturbating just simply?

I am also thinking of taking help of great lord Ganesha whom I stopped praying from last july.

Holy fuck!! now I understand, when I did my prayers I somehow woke up early, only watched sexy stuff(never masturbated). But after I joined coaching, I completely stopped my prayers. Slowly these two(sleep+porn) bad habits caught hold of me.

Okay from today, I will make a oath that I will pray even if I wake up late. Now I can complete the puzzle, which I will save it for another post because may be with this enlightenment I will stop masturbating for many years to come, because without getting rid of this bad habit, someday there are many chances that this fantasy may slowly develop into a misogyny. I also fear, if this bad habit is not deforested when it is still a plant, I can never be a best administrator.

For now in my life, masturbation and women are completely different. Masturbation(with aid of porn) is just a cure for my anxiety. I have immense respect for women, their problems.

I will be honored if god will give me a chance to serve, empower and uplift the women in this country and where ever they face problems for I cannot bear the sufferings.

To be frank with you, as soon as I thought of prayers, my gut feeling says this is the solution I was searching for. Now even if I'm thinking of Julia Ann I don't feel like masturbating. Wow, first good omen. Isn't it?

Okay bye for now.

I thank god for giving this opportunity to live this great life. I thank him for the feeling of love, empathy, compassion which I have towards poor(especially women, old and children). I thank you my god for telling me the real cause of my porn habit which I will certainly utilize to get rid of this bad habit.

I thank you for making me take a break, read books(especially 5AM club book) followed by Anne Frank diary.¬†

Thank you Lord Shiva, Thank you.

Om Namah Shivaya üïâüôè
